title: DNA and Genetic Information
objectives: Describe the role of DNA in heredity
Explain how genetic information is stored in chromosomes
Model the structure of DNA using physical materials

sequence.description: Watch short animation showing DNA replication
Groups build DNA models using kits and identify components
Teacher-led discussion on DNA structure and function
Students diagram how DNA stores genetic information
Quick quiz on DNA components and function

misconceptions: Students may think DNA is the same as genes
Students may not understand that all cells contain DNA
keyQuestions: Where is DNA located in a cell?
How does DNA determine your traits?
teachingGuidance.differentiationNotes: Provide pre-labeled DNA models for students who need scaffolding
